metadata.title: CVE-2024-26730 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: hwmon:(nct6775) Fix access to temperature configuration registers The number oftemperature configuration registers does not always match the total numberof temperature registers. This can result in access errors reported ifKASAN is enabled. BUG: KASAN: global-out-of-bounds innct6775_probe+0x5654/0x6fe9 nct6775_core

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
